item.title: Bx10b;Bx11
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb018640 Gene Symbol: Bx10b Bx11 Gene Name: benzoxazinone synthesis11 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: CcOMT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CZG_jg17822 Gene Symbol: CcOMT1 Gene Name: O-methyltransferase Genome: Species: Citrus reticulata Functional Descriptions: Using multi-omics resources, we discover a putative caffeic acid O-methyltransferase (CcOMT1) that can transfer a methyl group to the 3-hydroxyl of natsudaidain to form 3,5,6,7,8,3’,4’-heptamethoxyflavone (HPMF).

item.title: COMT;OsCOMT
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os08g06100 RAPdb gene ID: Os08g0157500 Gene Symbol: COMT OsCOMT OsCAldOMT1 ROMT9 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: CsCAD
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs1g20590 Gene Symbol: CsCAD Gene Name: Genome: Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: The transcript levels of lignin biosynthetic genes, namely, hydroxycinnamoyl transferase (CsHCT, CAP ID: Cs1g14450), cinnamyl alcohol dehydrogenase (CsCAD, CAP ID: Cs1g20590) and caffeoyl-CoA O-methyltransferase (CsCCoAOMT, CAP ID: Cs4g13430), were elevated in the leaves of the transgenic lines after mock inoculation and Xcc infection.

item.title: CsCCoAOMT
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs4g13430 Gene Symbol: CsCCoAOMT Gene Name: Genome: Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: The transcript levels of lignin biosynthetic genes, namely, hydroxycinnamoyl transferase (CsHCT, CAP ID: Cs1g14450), cinnamyl alcohol dehydrogenase (CsCAD, CAP ID: Cs1g20590) and caffeoyl-CoA O-methyltransferase (CsCCoAOMT, CAP ID: Cs4g13430), were elevated in the leaves of the transgenic lines after mock inoculation and Xcc infection.

item.title: CsCCoAOMT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs8g05410 Gene Symbol: CsCCoAOMT1 Gene Name: caffeoyl-CoA O-methyltransferase 1 Genome: Citrus sinensis reference genome Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: A multifunctional true caffeoyl coenzyme A O-methyltransferase (CsCCoAOMT1) enzyme participates in the biosynthesis of polymethoxylated flavones in citrus.

item.title: CsHCT
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs1g14450 Gene Symbol: CsHCT Gene Name: Genome: Reference genome of sweet orange Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsHCT,lignin biosynthetic genes, namely, hydroxycinnamoyl transferase.

item.title: FaOMT
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FaOMT Gene Name: O-methyltransferase Genome: Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: It is methylated further by FaOMT (Fragaria×ananassa O-methyltransferase) to 2,5-dimethyl-4-methoxy-3(2H)-furanone (DMMF) during the ripening process.

item.title: FtCOMT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FtPinG0009454400 Gene Symbol: FtCOMT1 Gene Name: caffeoyl-CoA OMT1 Genome: Pinku1 reference genome Species: Fagopyrum tataricum Functional Descriptions: Genome-wide association studies identified robust associations between FtCOMT1 and the accumulation of S lignin in seed hull.

item.title: GhOMT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GH_A01G2052 Gene Symbol: GhOMT1 Gene Name: flavonoid O-methyltransferase 1 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Function deficiency of GhOMT1 causes anthocyanidins over-accumulation and diversifies fibre colours in cotton.

item.title: MeASMT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Manes.13G140900 Gene Symbol: MeASMT1 Gene Name: N-aceylserotonin O-methyltransferase 1 Genome: Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: Melatonin synthesis genes N-aceylserotonin O-methyltransferase 1 (MeASMT1) expression and antiviral response.

item.title: MeCAT6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Manes.01G154400 Gene Symbol: MeCAT6 Gene Name: catalases 6 Genome: Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: Antioxidant gene catalases 6 (MeCAT6) expression and antiviral response.

item.title: PhCCoAOMT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PhCCoAOMT1 Gene Name: caffeoyl-coenzyme A O-methyltransferase 1 Genome: Species: Petunia hybrida Functional Descriptions: Cloned and characterized a caffeoyl-coenzyme A O-methyltransferase (PhCCoAOMT1) from the petals of the fragrant petunia ‘Mitchell’.

item.title: PrCCoAOMT
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PrCCoAOMT Gene Name: caffeoyl-CoA O-methyltransferase Genome: Species: Pinus radiata Functional Descriptions: A cDNA clone encoding the lignin-related enzyme caffeoyl CoA 3-O-methyltransferase (CCoAOMT) was isolated from a Pinus radiata cDNA library derived from differentiating xylem.

item.title: SlMET1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc11g030600 Gene Symbol: SlMET1 Gene Name: Methyltransferase 1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: In leaf tissues, mutations in SlMET1 caused CG hypomethylation and CHH hypermethylation on a whole-genome scale, leading to a disturbed transcriptome including ectopic expression of many RIN target genes such as ACC2 in leaf tissues, which are normally expressed in fruits.

item.title: TaSAMT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS3B02G445100 Gene Symbol: TaSAMT1 Gene Name: SA methyltransferase 1 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Methyltransferase TaSAMT1 mediates wheat freezing tolerance by integrating brassinosteroid and salicylic acid signaling.
